snippet.title: DRAGON BALL Z: KAKAROT - Announcement Trailer | PS4, X1, PC
snippet.description:
Determination, Despair, and Hope -- Discover the story of the mysterious Dragon Balls in the all-new DRAGON BALL GAME – PROJECT Z! #DragonBallZ #Videogames #BandaiNamco

Join Goku and fellow warriors in the neverending search for the ultimate fight -- COMING 2019!

Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment: 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous/?hl=en
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS/
Tumblr: http://bandainamcous.tumblr.com/
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/bandainamcous
